arm_group.arm_group_label: All patients for PSG at SLBO
arm_group.description: All patients incoming in the sleep study centre for a PSG. At the arrival the screening score will be recorder. AHI will be recorded next morning after analysis of the PSG.

brief_summary.textblock:
Comparison of different screening score for OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea) with the results
      of a polysomnography (PSG). The different screening score studied are: STOP-BANG, DES-OSA,
      P-SAP and OSA50.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Different Screening Score for OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea) With the Results of a Polysomnography (PSG)

detailed_description.textblock:
The investigators should compare the four screening scores (STOP-BANG, DES-OSA, P-SAP and
      OSA50) with the results of the PSG (and in particular the number of apnea and hypopnea
      index).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Adults patients (> 18 years)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  None

study_pop.textblock: All adults patients for an overnight polysomnography at SLBO.

intervention.arm_group_label: All patients for PSG at SLBO
intervention.description: All patients incoming in the sleep study centre for a PSG. Comparison between screening score and AHI derived from PSG.
intervention.intervention_name: All patients incoming in the sleep study centre for a PSG

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Different Screening Score for OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea)

oversight_info.authority: Belgium: Federal Agency for Medicinal Products and Health Products

primary_outcome.description: Comparison of the DES-OSA score with the results of previously described scores (STOP-BANG, P-SAP and OSA50).
primary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the DES-OSA score with previously described scores.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of the four screening scores collected past day (before PSG - PolySomnoGraphy) with the results of the PSG (especially the AHI: Apnea Hypopnea Index)
secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the four screening scores with results of the PSG.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
